articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Sinchon Museum
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, gave field guidance to the Sinchon Museum, an epitome of history showing the brutality and cruelty of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					 He said he came to the museum to arouse the servicepersons and civilians of the country to an all-out anti-U.S. struggle by intensifying the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. education and class education among them in keeping with the requirements of the prevailing situation and the developing revolution.
					
					 Recalling the day in November 1998 when he visited the museum in company with Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, he went round its main building and tombs of 400 mothers and 102 children.
					
					 The massacres committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors in Sinchon evidently showed that they are cannibals and homicides seeking pleasure in slaughter, he said, adding that the Korean people would never forget the brutal atrocities committed by the U.S. murderers and class enemies in Sinchon and many other areas of the northern half of Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that illusion about the enemy just means death and any slightest illusion about the enemy may lead to the renunciation of the revolution and eventually spoil it.
					
					 U.S. imperialism is the arch-villain of aggression which came into being and got fattened with aggression and plundering, he pointed out. Its nature and brutality as an aggressor remain unchanged forever, and if there is any change today, it has got more insidious and crafty in the method to satisfy its greed for aggression, he said, stressing that to intensify the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. education and class education at present is vital to the prospect of the Korean revolution and the destiny of the country.
					
					 He further said: To intensify the class education is more urgent today when the younger generation, who experienced neither exploitation and oppression nor the stern trials of war, have emerged the driving force of the revolution. The class education should not be delayed or neglected for a moment though time passes and generations are replaced, but it should be intensified in depth and on a permanent basis.
					
					 As fish cannot live without water, it is impossible to think about sovereign life of people and dignity and value of human beings without anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. education and class education, he said, stressing that victory of the revolution and socialism mainly depends on how to conduct such education.
					
					 He underscored the need to deeply implant the DPRK army and people with the strong anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. class consciousness and the outlook on the principal enemy so as to firmly defend the stronghold of the revolution and class position and achieve the final victory of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 He urged the party and working people's organizations to intensify the class education among the party members and other working people, well aware of why the Workers' Party of Korea attaches importance to the class education.
					
					 He said if the class education is to be intensified, it is important to build up the Sinchon Museum and other class education centers across the country and deepen the education through them.
					
					 The Sinchon Museum should be rebuilt into a model of class education centers and data and evidence pieces be displayed well in a scientific way there, he said, adding the museum should be equipped with all facilities for convenience of visitors to it.
					
					 Visit to the museum should be organized under a meticulous plan and the efficacy of revenge-vowing meetings at the powder depot, tomb of 400 mothers and tomb of 102 children in Pamnamu (chestnut) Village, which testify to the enemy's atrocities, should be raised to make the visitors nurse surging hatred and revenge upon the enemy, he said.
					
					 The supreme leader stressed the need for lecturers at the museum to enhance their responsibility and role in ensuring the class education. Those lecturers are core of the WPK and career revolutionaries as they always stand at the outpost of class education, no matter whether they are recognized or not, implanting the class consciousness into the party members and other working people and servicepersons, he said, adding that deep attention should be paid to their living conditions.
					
					 He met Ju Sang Won, who survived at the powder depot of Pamnamu Village, used as a killing place by the U.S. imperialist aggressors during the Korean War, and has served at the museum for decades, and Pak Yong Suk who has been active as a lecturer of the museum for 23 years, and gave pep talks to them.
					
					 Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the officials and employees of the museum, expressing belief that they would creditably discharge their heavy yet honorable duty.
					
					 Accompanying him were Kim Ki Nam, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Jae Il, Kim Yo Jong and Pak Myong Chol.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Visits Russia
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Visits Russia
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, visited the Russian Federation from Nov. 17 to 24 as a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Choe met Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, at Kremlin, Moscow on Nov. 18.
					
					 Choe courteously conveyed greetings and a personal letter of Kim Jong Un to Putin.
					
					 Choe and Putin reaffirmed the will of both sides to boost reciprocal cooperation and further deepen exchanges and contacts in political, economic, military and all other fields in the significant year 2015.
					
					 Choe held talks with Sergei Lavrov, Russian foreign minister, in Moscow on Nov. 20.
					
					 At the talks, they had an in-depth discussion on the matters arising in developing the DPRK-Russia friendly relations onto a higher stage such as the issues of promoting bilateral cooperation in economic, trade and humanitarian fields and boosting cooperation in the international arena.
					
					 Both sides reached a consensus of views on organizing grand joint celebrations and reenergizing visits and cooperation between the two countries, including exchange of delegations, next year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					
					 They reaffirmed the joint understanding that all sorts of joint military drills and arms buildup should be halted and the danger of a nuclear war be defused on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity and the issue of the peninsula be settled in a peaceful manner.
					
					 Also discussed at the talks were the issues of making sustained efforts to resume the six-party talks without any precondition and creating atmosphere and environment favorable for the resumption of the talks.
					
					 During the visit No Kwang Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, met with Andrei Kartapolov, deputy chief of the General Staff and director of its General Operation Bureau of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, and Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, with Alexandr Galushka, minister of Development of Far East of Russia.
					
					 Both sides had a wide-ranging exchange of views on substantial issues arising in further revitalizing exchange and cooperation in military, economic and trade fields.
					
					 During their stay in Moscow the special envoy and his party visited the Lenin Mausoleum, the Central Museum of the Great Patriotic War, the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier by the side of the Kremlin Castle Wall, the Kremlin, etc.
					
					 They toured Khabarovsk and Maritime Territories of the Russian Federation from Nov. 21.
					
					 The special envoy's party separately met with Byacheslav Shport, governor of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration, and Vladimir Mikulushevski, governor of the Maritime Territory Administration, and discussed issues of boosting the regional cooperation and exchange in the fields of industry, agriculture, forestry, transport service, sports and culture.
					
					 The special envoy's party visited St. Bishop Innokenty of Irkutsk Church, Russian Orthodox Church, and the Folk Museum in Khabarovsk, the Ignat Trade Center and the Vlad Bread Factory in Vladivostok visited by leader Kim Jong Il during his trip to the Russian Federation. They also visited the Command of Army No. 5 in the Eastern Military District of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, the Military History Museum of the Pacific Sea Fleet and various other places.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of KFA Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of KFA Held
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) took place in Belgium on Nov. 15.
					 Hung on the front wall of the venue of the meeting were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a flag of the DPRK.
					
					 Displayed there were works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of holding significant remembrance events on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il and the orientation and programs of the KFA and its branches in different countries which will be held in 2015 marking the 70th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 70th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Present there were Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, officials of the leadership of the association and representatives of branches in Britain, Denmark and other countries.

articles.title: Service Personnel and People in Pyongyang Meet to Denounce "Human Rights" Racket of U.S. and Its Allies
articles.content:
Service Personnel and People in Pyongyang Meet to Denounce "Human Rights" Racket of U.S. and Its Allies
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A rally of service personnel and people in Pyongyang was held at Kim Il Sung Square here on Tuesday to support the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and mercilessly foil the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. and its followers.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae, and the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and working people of institutions, industrial establishments and co-op farms, teachers and students of universities and colleges here.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of their embassies and members of the military attaches corps here.
					
					 The statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was read out. Then the floor was taken by representatives of the Korean People's Army, workers, agricultural workers and youth and students.
					
					 The speakers termed the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" an impudent political chicanery as it was aimed to defame the dignity of the DPRK and totally obliterate everything dear to the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S., the worst human rights tundra and kingpin of human rights abuses, sponsored the "human rights resolution" in collusion with such riff-raffs as the EU, Japan and the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea. This is the height of impudence, they noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers kicked off the reckless anti-DPRK "human rights" racket by abusing the UN though they can hardly mind their own business. This is no more than an undisguised declaration of a war to disgrace the genuine human rights of the DPRK and infringe upon its sovereignty.
					
					 They called for demonstrating the spirit and might of heroic Korea just as the victors in the great years defeated the U.S. imperialists by dedicating their youth to their only motherland. 
					
					  Victory will always be in store for Korea, they declared.
					
					  Then followed a mammoth demonstration.

articles.title: National Presentation of Scientific and Technological Successes in Field of Mining Industry Held
articles.content:
National Presentation of Scientific and Technological Successes in Field of Mining Industry Held
						
 Unpha, November 25 (KCNA) -- A national presentation of scientific and technological successes in the field of mining industry took place at the Unpha Mine in North Hwanghae Province on Tuesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 It was attended by scientists, technicians, teachers and researchers of various units including the Central Mining Research Institute and the Ferrous Metal Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Phyongsong University of Coal Mining.
					
					 Presented there were the experience gained in putting the dressing plant of the Unpha Mine on a CNC basis and more than 110 successes which contributed to boosting the production of mines and coal mines.

articles.title: Samcholli Lighting Appliances Factory
articles.content:
Samcholli Lighting Appliances Factory
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The Samcholli Lighting Appliances Factory, located in Rangnang District of Pyongyang City in the DPRK, is well-known for producing different kinds of LED lamps.
					 Its Manager Pak Song Ryong, when interviewed by KCNA, said:
					
					 The factory is equipped with latest facilities to produce LED lamps of different outputs. And its production environment is conforming with ISO 4 000.
					
					 The factory has an integrated system of research on products, production, sale and technical service with an institute and a laboratory.
					
					 The factory is putting spurs to developing new LED lamps of different utilities.
					
					 Now the factory produces LED lamps ranging from 1W to 100W and superpower LED floodlights.
					
					 Those lamps and floodlights won high appraisal at the national festival of science and technology held this year.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Sapling Production
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Sapling Production
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been made in the DPRK to produce good species of saplings.
					 The Central Tree Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection has increased the production of saplings for afforestation after putting their production on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis.
					
					 This year alone, it carefully tended over hundred hectares of samplings despite severe drought. And it raised the rate of rooting by introducing advanced methods, thus overfulfilling its yearly production plan at 120 percent.
					
					 It sent saplings of Pinus strobes, Larix leptolepis, Zelkova and others to the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun as well as provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 Meanwhile, tree nurseries in different parts of the country are directing efforts to producing different kinds of saplings, making great contribution to turning the whole country into thick woodland and greenery.

articles.title: Symposium on Kyongrak Theory to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Symposium on Kyongrak Theory to Be Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on Kyongrak theory will take place in the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Ri Il Gon, chief of the Acupuncture and Moxibustion Institute under the Academy of Koryo Medicine, told KCNA:
					
					 Kyongrak (channels and collaterals) theory, set up 2 000 years ago as one of anatomical concepts, serves as a major basis for Koryo medicine, acupuncture and moxibustion in particular.
					
					 Koryo medicine is a traditional medicine peculiar to the Korean nation, which has been inherited for thousands of years.
					
					 In Ancient Korea (early 30th century B.C.-108 B.C.) people used needles made of stone or animal bones in treating diseases. And this developed into acupuncture in the period of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) to become known to other countries.
					
					 The great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il had paid deep attention to the study of Kyongrak in their lifetime. Under their deep care, a group for research into Koryo medicine was organized in the 1950s and signal achievements were made in the field of traditional medicine.
					
					 Some years ago a new chart of meridian nerve points was produced in the country.
					
					  The chart, conducive to the treatment of incurable diseases, has been already introduced worldwide through international documents.

articles.title: Specter of Ruin of Roman Empire Haunts U.S.: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Specter of Ruin of Roman Empire Haunts U.S.: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama making a speech at a university in Australia recently said it is the best time to live in history but there are so many threats to the present world order that those disputes have to be settled in a peaceful manner.
					 Secretary of Defense Hagel at a meeting of those concerned of the military in California said there is no guarantee that the U.S. military and technological advantages that became the basis of the international security order in the last century would automatically last in the 21st century, too.
					
					 This is a poor shriek of those facing ruin.
					
					 This is recognition of the dark reality in the U.S. as it is a reflection of extreme uneasiness and horror-phobia.
					
					 The U.S. is now thrown into confusion as its uni-polar domination system called world order is getting out of control.
					
					 Its military muscle and dollar's position that have propped Washington's moves for world domination are now sinking rapidly.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes and its measures for bolstering them qualitatively and quantitatively have become a nightmare-like blow to the U.S. keen to carry out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 At a time when the U.S. was grappling with troubles in the Middle East, styling itself a world gendarme without any ground, many countries put spurs to increasing military capabilities to cope with possible aggression by the world's "only superpower".
					
					 Lots of aggression wars waged by the U.S. in different parts of the world led to huge military expenditure, plunging the U.S. already saddled with heavy debts into a bottomless financial and economic crisis.
					
					 The U.S. excessive issue of dollars for the settlement of the issues of huge military expenditure and financial deficit is resulting in the steady devaluation of the U.S. dollar.
					
					 This suicidal act and wide-ranging use of national and regional currencies in various countries and regions are shaking down to the roots the present international financial system with U.S. dollar as a main currency.
					
					 To top it all, the U.S. hegemonic moves have been snubbed even by its allies, to say nothing of the international community.
					
					 The U.S. is, therefore, driven to its wit's end unable to handle Ukrainian crisis and other major international issues at will.
					
					 As a ruining house has often fights, the U.S. is locked in fierce bickering over such complicated issues as military budget.
					
					 The U.S. has now the hardest time in its history.
					
					 Yet, it has gone so foolish as to cover up its predicament through such talk as the "best time to live" and "peaceful settlement". This reminds one of the old Roman empire that was buried in history after facing a ruin for coveting for prosperity through aggression and wars.
					
					 The poor fate of the U.S. reminiscent of the ruin of the Roman empire is a due outcome of its history of aggression and arbitrary practices.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- It was reported that shortly ago the U.S. Department of Justice massively collected individual data on people using cell phones by using a plane equipped with special devices. This "spy plane", which went operational in 2007, has conducted intelligence activities with airports of five large cities of the U.S. as bases, collecting individual data of tens of thousands of people through a single flight.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 It fully revealed how deplorable the U.S. view and concept of the value of human rights are.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presents itself, the U.S. is talking a lot about "freedom" of individuals and "democracy".
					
					 As already exposed through heinous human rights abuses by the U.S. National Security Agency called "Prism operation", the U.S. is committing indiscriminate espionage, putting not only its mainland but the world into a huge watch network. Human rights of individuals and even heads of state of other countries are being ruthlessly abused by the U.S.
					
					 It is indisputable that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser, an empire violating human rights and an "empire of evil" as it is perpetrating the above-said crimes in a bid to maintain its reactionary political system. Such being a hard reality, it is styling itself a "human rights judge," lording it over the world, labeling other countries "human rights abusers" and using the inviolable human rights for attaining its goal of aggression. This is a mockery and insult to human rights and disgrace of mankind.
					
					 If justice is to live on in the international community, it should bring the U.S. to a court before anyone else.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Talking Volumes about "Observing Agreements"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Talking Volumes about "Observing Agreements"
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is talking volumes about "observing the agreements" in a bid to conceal its act of scuppering the hard-won opportunity of improving the north-south relations and mislead the public opinion at home and abroad.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 This is just like "the guilty party filing the suit first".
					
					 The north-south agreement should be observed and implemented under any circumstances as it is a product common to the nation which was made irrespective of ideology, social system, ideal and religious belief, and no one has the right to violate the inter-Korean agreements as he pleases.
					
					 The article cites facts about how the successive south Korean authorities have deliberately breached the agreements, persistently bedeviling the north-south relations.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet regime evade the blame for reneging on the north-south agreements and chilling the atmosphere of mending the inter-Korean relations, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The war racket and the "human rights" campaign kicked up by the puppet group against the DPRK with the backing of foreign forces, turning down the sincere proposal of compatriots to jointly settle the national issue, are unpardonable criminal acts to push the inter-Korean relations to an extreme phase of confrontation and realize its ambition for stifling the DPRK in conspiracy with foreign forces.
					
					 The north-south agreements on which the destiny of the nation and the prospect for reunification hinge can never become a plaything of the south Koran ruling quarters' policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to boldly discard the inveterate bad habit of reneging on the precious national agreements and learn the habit of sincerely implementing them, if they truly want dialogue and improved relations between the north and the south.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending Dignity of Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defending Dignity of Nation
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have enshrined deep in their mind the truth that the dignity and honor of the nation are dearer than their lives, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 The bitter history of the Korean nation clearly teaches that a nation should protect its dignity by its own efforts, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 We are now leading a worthy life, proud of being members of the Korean nation. Towering high is the dignity of the Korean people who had once been exposed to the danger of loosing their Korean names forever, subject to the destiny of a stateless nation due to a fierce scramble among big powers.
					
					 The U.S. has always sustained defeats in its showdown with the DPRK because it has never tried to see and understand the mental power of the Korean nation.
					
					 Is the U.S. aware of what consequences would be entailed by its act of hurting the self-esteem of the Korean people living with high pride, enjoying human rights under the most advantageous social system in the world, and of daring defame the dignity of their country which they deem dearer than their own lives?
					
					 Impaired self-respect knows no mercy. One can never show mercy to the enemy defaming one's dignity.
					
					 The world will soon clearly witness that the DPRK's declaration of its will to bolster up its war deterrence without limitation to cope with the U.S. armed intervention and invasion is not an empty talk.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will mercilessly blow up the citadel of evils to defend the Korean style socialist system, a land of bliss for the dignity of the nation and genuine human rights, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Military Gangster's Invectives
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Military Gangster's Invectives
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Min Sok, spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense, speaking before media persons, impudently urged the north to "abandon nuclear development", claiming  that someone's assertion may lead to "nuclear test and ballistic missile launch". And he cried out for maintaining a "posture to cope with them".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 Kim Min Sok is a bat-blind person and an unlettered man who does not know where he stands in the world. But he is a pitiful trumpeter prolonging his remaining days by repeating the words of his master like a parrot.
					
					 Lurking behind his agitation for confrontation and war is a criminal scenario of the puppet warmongers to cover up their aggressive goal of the "human rights" racket against the DPRK and steadily escalate this into a nuclear war against it.
					
					 Recently the south Korean puppet forces staged the largest-ever Hoguk joint military exercises together with the U.S. after turning their face away from the sincerity and magnanimity of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They let ultra-right conservative gangsters hold provocative farces in different parts of south Korea, staging military parade and rattling the nerves of the DPRK with the fourth anniversary of the Yonphyong Island incident as a momentum. They took the lead in railroading the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the UN General Assembly, playing a dirty role of hand-raising machine of the U.S.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that it is a premeditated and deliberate move to stir up the atmosphere of the operations for stifling the DPRK in league with foreign forces and lead this to a war against it.
					
					 The frantic war moves against the north stepped up by the puppet warmongers with the U.S. would only prove the validity of the measures taken by the DPRK for bolstering up deterrence for self-defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A remembrance committee of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan was formed on Nov. 12 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to hold events such as floral basket-laying, remembrance meeting and photo exhibition on that occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Koreans in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- A memorial committee of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia was formed on Nov. 15 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Chil Song, chairman of the confederation, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to organize events such as floral basket-laying and remembrance meeting on that occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Quito on Nov. 17.
					 Osvaldo Larriva Alvarado, chairman of the Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in Ecuador, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a national memorial service and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Personages of Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Personages of Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar issued statements on Nov. 15 and 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A member of the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was the leader and benevolent father of the Korean people and the world progressives as he devoted his all to the prosperity of the country, people's happiness and accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 He led the Korean revolution to the brilliant victory by carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended socialist Korea with his original Songun politics, smashing the vicious moves of hostile forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 His cause is being successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, and the Korean people are making world-startling successes in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation under his wise leadership.
					
					 The general president of a publishing house of Myanmar said that the exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the country's prosperity, people's happiness and the global peace and security would be immortal.

articles.title: Stand of WPK and DPRK Government Supported by Egyptian Political Party
articles.content:
Stand of WPK and DPRK Government Supported by Egyptian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt issued a statement on Nov. 17 in support of the just stand of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the government of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that it is a legitimate right of the DPRK for self-defense that it had access to the nuclear deterrence to cope with aggression moves while condemning and rejecting the U.S. policy for aggression against it.
					
					 It said:
					
					 It is natural that the DPRK took all measures to defend the country's sovereignty and people's dignity.
					
					 The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt extends solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to defend the country's dignity and fully supports the just stand of the DPRK to protect time-honored history and realize the people's desire.
					
					 We wish the WPK success in the struggle for socialist construction to achieve the people's prosperity and development on the basis of impartiality, equality and justice and for the reunification of the country under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in South Africa
						
 Pyongyang, November 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Pretoria Copy Master Publishing House in South Africa on Nov. 19 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Museo de Sinchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Museo de Sinchon
						
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno el Museo de Sinchon, lugar de denuncia de la historia y miniatura que demuestra la brutalidad de los yanquis y los enemigos de clase.
					El Mariscal dijo que lo visita para llamar con vigor a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la confrontacion antiyanqui al fortalecer mas la educacion antiimperialista, antiyanqui y clasista entre los militares y habitantes, conforme a la demanda de la situacion actual y la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Al recordar con emocion el dia de su visita en noviembre de 1998 junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il recorrio el edificio principal del museo, el cementerio de 400 madres y el de 102 ninos.
					
					Apunto que la masacre perpetrada en Sinchon por el imperialismo norteamericano demuestra claramente que los agresores yanquis son precisamente los canibales y asesinos que toman el exterminio humano como diversion y que nuestro pueblo nunca olvidara la barbaridad cometida por los yanquis y los enemigos clasistas en Sinchon y otras localidades de la parte Norte de la Republica.
					
					La ilusion sobre el enemigo significa la muerte y deja de hacer la revolucion y al fin y al cabo, la revolucion fracasara, enfatizo.
					
					Senalo que el imperialismo norteamericano es el cabecilla de la agresion que aparecio y enriquecio con la agresion y el saqueo.
					
					Nunca se cambiara el caracter agresivo y la brutalidad de los yanquis, pero lo que se ha cambiado hoy en dia es que se ha hecho mas astuto y perverso el metodo para realizar su ambicion agresiva, dijo y continuo que fortalecer mas la educacion antiimperialista, antiyanqui y clasista es un problema muy importante y vital, relacionado con el futuro de nuestra revolucion y el destino de la patria.
					
					ã€€Sobre todo, intensificar la educacion clasista es mas urgente en la actualidad en que nuevas generaciones que no sufrieron el saqueo, la represion y las severas pruebas de la guerra se han convertido en las fuerzas principales de nuestra revolucion. Y ordeno profundizar mas y realizar permanentemente la educacion clasista, aunque pasen muchos anos y se cambien las generaciones.
					
					Como los peces no pueden vivir fuera del agua, nunca se puede pensar en la vida independiente y la dignidad y el valor del ser humano, al margen de la educacion antiimperialista, antiyanqui y clasista, dijo y agrego que la victoria o la derrota de la revolucion y el socialismo depende de como realizar la educacion clasista.
					
					El Mariscal asevero que para defender con firmeza la base revolucionaria y clasista y lograr la victoria final de la revolucion coreana hay que infundir a fondo entre nuestro ejercito y el pueblo la firme conciencia antiimperialista, antiyanqui y clasista y la concepcion del enemigo principal.
					
					Subrayo que las organizaciones del Partido y de trabajadores deben tener presente la voluntad del Partido de dar importancia a la educacion clasista y elevar mas su nivel entre los miembros del Partido y los trabajadores.
					
					Para fortalecer la educacion clasista hay que acondicionar bien el Museo de Sinchon y otros centros de educacion clasista en todas partes del pais y a base de ellos, profundizar mas la educacion, apunto.
					
					Ordeno reconstruir el Museo de Sinchon como modelo del centro de educacion clasista, exhibir alli de manera cientifica los datos y testimonios y disponer bien de todas las instalaciones favorables a la visita.
					
					Deben organizar con escrupulosidad la visita al Museo de Sinchon, dijo y continuo que se debe aumentar mas la eficiencia de mitin de venganza ante el polvorin del bosque de castanos, el cementerio de 400 madres y el de 102 ninos, miniatura de la barbaridad de los enemigos para que los visitantes tengan el vehemente odio y el espiritu de venganza al enemigo.
					
					Subrayo que para realizar bien la educacion clasista, hay que elevar la responsabilidad y el papel de las conferenciantes y agrego que  ellas son las miembros nucleares del Partido que defienden siempre la primera linea de la educacion clasista y las revolucionarias profesionales que infunden la conciencia clasista a los miembros del Partido, los trabajadores y militares, por tanto hay que atender bien sus vida.
					
					Este dia, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un se reunio con Ju Sang Won quien habia quedado con vida en el polvorin de rencor y defiende siempre la base de educacion clasista durante decenas de anos y Pak Yong Suk quien trabaja como conferenciante durante 23 anos y les estimulo cordialmente.
					
					El Mariscal expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados del Museo de Sinchon cumpliran muy bien su mision importante y honorable y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Kim Ki Nam, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Jae Il, Kim Yo Jong y Pak Myong Chol.

articles.title: Enviado especial de Kim Jong Un visita la Federacion Rusa
articles.content:
Enviado especial de Kim Jong Un visita la Federacion Rusa
						
Pyongyang, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, realizo desde el dia 17 hasta el 24 de noviembre una visita a la Federacion Rusa en calidad de enviado especial de Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El se reunio el dia 18 en Kremlin de Moscu con el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					
					Entrego al mandatario ruso el saludo y carta personal del Mariscal.
					
					El visitante y el anfitrion reafirmaron la voluntad de ambas partes de desarrollar mas la cooperacion de beneficio mutuo entre los dos paises y profundizar el intercambio y el contacto en todos los sectores, inclusive la politica, la economia y los asuntos militares en 2015, ano significativo para los dos paises.
					
					El dia 20, Choe sostuvo conversaciones en Moscu con el canciller ruso Serguei Lavrov.
					
					En este encuentro fueron debatidos profundamente los asuntos que se presentan para fomentar la cooperacion bilateral en las ramas de economia, comercio y humanitarismo, fortalecer la colaboracion en la palestra internacional y desarrollar en una etapa mas alta las relaciones de amistad Corea-Rusia.
					
					Ambas partes llegaron a una unanimidad de criterios en organizar con solemnidad los actos conmemorativos conjuntos en 2015 en que se cumplira el 70o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea y de la victoria de Rusia en la Gran Guerra Patria y activar el viaje y cooperacion  entre los dos paises incluido el intercambio de delegaciones.
					
					Ratificaron el entendimiento comun de que deben parar todos los ejercicios militares conjuntos de toda indole y los movimientos de aumento armamentista y eliminar el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores y coordinar por via pacifica el problema de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Abordaron el problema de esforzarse de continuo por la reanudacion incondicional de las conversaciones a 6 bandas y crear un ambiente favorable a ella.
					
					Durante la visita, el subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, No Kwang Chol, y el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Kwang Gun se reunieron con el subjefe del Estado Mayor General de las Fuerzas Armadas Federales de Rusia y director general de su buro de operaciones, Andrei Kartapolov, y el ministro de Desarrollo del Lejano Oriente de Rusia, Alexandr Galushka, respectivamente.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron ampliamente las opiniones sobre los asuntos reales para dinamizar el intercambio y la cooperacion en la rama militar, la economia y el comercio.
					
					Durante la estancia en Moscu, el enviado especial y su comitiva recorrieron el Mausoleo de Lenin, el Museo Central de la Gran Guerra Patria, la tumba de heroes desconocidos, Kremlin, etc.
					
					A partir del dia 21, el enviado especial y su comitiva viajaron al territorio litoral de Jabarovsk y el territorio litoral de la FR.
					
					En los encuentros por separados con el gobernador de la Administracion del Territorio Litoral de Jabarovsk de la Federacion Rusa, Byacheslav Shport, y el gobernador de la Administracion del Territorio Litoral, Vladimir Mikulushevski, los visitantes debatieron los problemas de ampliar y fortalecer la cooperacion e intercambio regionales en sectores de industria, agricultura, selvicultura, transporte, deporte y cultura.
					
					Hicieron recorrido por el convento San Innokenty de Irkutsk, iglesia ortodoxa de Rusia, y el Museo Folclorico en la ciudad de Jabarovsk y el centro comercial "Ignat" y la Fabrica de Pan de Vlad en Vladivostok donde estuvo el Dirigente Kim Jong Il durante su visita a la FR, etc. Y dieron vueltas por la comandancia de Ejercito no.5 en el Distrito Militar de Este de las Fuerzas Armadas de la FR, el Museo de la Historia Militar de la Flota del Pacifico y otros lugares.

articles.title: Efectuada presentacion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de industria minera
articles.content:
Efectuada presentacion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de industria minera
						
Unpha, 25 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Bajo el auspicio del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea tuvo lugar el dia 25 en la Mina Unpha de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte la presentacion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de la rama de la industria minera.
					Estuvieron presentes los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores y funcionarios en el terreno de varias unidades incluyendo el Instituto Central de Mineria e Instituto de Metales Ferrosos de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y el Instituto Superior de Industria Hullera de Phyongsong.
					
					Se presentaron las experiencias logradas en la aplicacion de la tecnologia CNC en el centro de enriquecimiento de minerales de la Mina de Unpha y mas de 110 datos que hicieron aporte a activar la produccion de las minas. 
					
					Entre ellos figuran las disertaciones "el aparato de medicion de pulverizacion en la planta de enriquecimiento de minerales", "el detonador multifuncional a larga distancia", etc.
